Service Details: - Offers employment services to assist individuals who have a disability, or are an immigrant, or are over the age of 50- Participants will receive basic computer skills, your skills matched to real jobs, increased confidence, focused resumes and job search skills wage subsidy, individual job coaching, follow-up support, information on Canadian workplace culture, and certifications, such as First Aid and Food Safe
Hours: Mon-Fri: 8:30am - 4:30pm (closed 12pm - 1pm) training hours vary, please call or email for schedule
Eligibility: Ages: 18 year(s) and upMust be:- A resident of BC- 18 years or older- Unemployed / not on EI (have not had an EI claim within the last 3 years, or a maternity / parental claim in the last 5 years)- Not a student
